meanings.definition: The act of dividing something again.
meanings.sent1: The redivisions of the cake ensured everyone got a fair share.
meanings.sent2: The redivisions of the land led to smaller plots for each farmer.
meanings.sent3: The redivisions of the toys caused laughter among the children.
meanings.sent4: The redivisions of power in the company brought about new leadership.
meanings.sent5: The redivisions of the puzzle pieces made it easier to solve.

meanings.definition: The result of dividing something again.
meanings.sent1: The redivisions of the budget left some departments with less funding.
meanings.sent2: After the redivisions of the resources, each team had what they needed.
meanings.sent3: The redivisions of the colors in the painting created a unique effect.
meanings.sent4: The redivisions of the population caused shifts in demographics.
meanings.sent5: The redivisions of the ingredients improved the recipe.
